verse.lines: Like a river glorious is Godâ€™s perfect peace, Over all victorious, in its bright increase; Perfect, yet it floweth fuller every day, Perfect, yet it groweth deeper all the way.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Stayed upon Jehovah, hearts are fully blest Finding, as He promised, perfect peace and rest.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Hidden in the hollow of His blessed hand, Never foe can follow, never traitor stand; Not a surge of worry, not a shade of care, Not a blast of hurry touch the spirit there.
